questions.subject: Reasoning
questions.questions: Study the following information carefully and answer the questions that follow. Eight boxes A, B, C, D, E, F, G and H are kept one above another. These boxes are of different colours namely, Orange, White, Violet, Green, Black, Grey, Red and Yellow but not respectively in the same order. Three boxes are kept between the one whose colour is Yellow and the one whose colour is Green, one of them is at the bottommost position. Box E is orange and kept immediately below Box B. Two boxes are kept between D and B. Box D is kept at the topmost position. Box G is placed in the middle of Box B and Box C and is of Black colour. Three boxes are placed between G and F. Box B is placed above Box C. The Box which is white in colour is placed immediately above Box H. Three boxes are placed between the one which is grey in colour and the one which is red in colour. Grey colour box is above red colour box. Box H is placed above Box A. Box C is of green colour. Which box is kept at the fourth position from the top?

options.A: The box which is yellow in colour
options.D: The box which is red in colour

questions.explanation: 1. Three boxes are kept between the one whose colour is Yellow and the one whose colour is Green, one of them is at the bottommost position. 2. Box D is kept at the topmost position. Two boxes are kept between D and B. Box E is orange and kept immediately below Box B. 3. Box G is placed in the middle of Box B and Box C and is of Black colour. Three boxes are placed between G and F. Box B is placed above Box C. 4. The Box which is white in colour is placed immediately above Box H. Three boxes are placed between the one which is grey in colour and the one which is red in colour. Box H is placed above Box A. Grey colour box is above red colour box. 5. Box C is of green colour, therefore CASE II is not true. Box D is of Violet colour.
